did.unittitle: Coremakers Union of Auburn, NY Minute Books on Microfilm, 1891-1903
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Microfilm copies of minutebooks for the Coremakers Union of Auburn, NY

bioghist.p: Coremaker's Union no. 5394 was organized on April 17, 1891, in Auburn, N.Y. William Bascomb was the first person elected president, and Edgar Titus was elected to serve as his vice president.

scopecontent.p: A negative copy is available upon request.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Coremakers Union of Auburn, NY, Minute Books on Microfilm #5673 mf. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5671: International Molders Union, No. 107 (Auburn, NY) Minute Books 5671 mf: International Molders Union, No. 107 (Auburn, NY) Minute Books on Microfilm 5673: Coremakers Union of Auburn, NY, Minute Books 5911: TWUA Locals 1242, 3, 607, 129, Greater Northern Joint Board Minute Books
